title: Zombie Apocalypse - Novel Updates
tags: Futuristic Setting   Godly Powers   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Post-apocalyptic   R*pe   Weak to Strong   Zombies
author: Xiong Mao Kuai Pao   熊猫快跑
description: The outbreak of an unknown virus infection has turned the city of Hanghai into a living hell. The people infected have turned into scary zombies. Three months ago, Qin An's wife divorced him and told him that the virus was about to spread and that Hanghai city was about to become a quarantine area, leaving him with a pile of supplies. Three months later, he has slowly healed his wounds from the divorce, and now he's thinking about how to live.>
